name: Giantec Semiconductor
overview:
Giantec Semiconductor Inc. is a company spun off from ISSIï¼ˆIntegrated Silicon Solutionï¼ŒInc.ï¼‰. Giantec has R&D, Manufacturing, Marketing and Sales teams located in Shanghai, China, plus sales branches in USA, Taiwan, Hong Kong & China. We aim not only to be a provider of EEPROM, MCU, and PM but also a worldwide leading chip solution provider. We have a professional management team with over twenty years experience in semiconductor industry and an IC designing expert team with over ten years experience in Digital and Analog designing.

Currently, Giantec has two product lines, EEPROM and MCU/Smart Card and is developing Power Management in order to provide a total chip solution to our customers. MCU products are mainly consist of Smart Card recently, however the new MCU products will not only apply to Smart Card application but also to other areas widely like intelligent energy meters, home electronic products and etc. Our products are sold to worldwide, like America, Europe, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, India, etc.

Giantec Semiconductor Inc. is focusing on innovative, vigorous and sustainable industries like electronics, networking, telecommunication, home electronic applications, computers, smart energy meters, medical, automotive, transportation, etc. We are strict in developing and manufacturing our products in terms of international standards and provide the products for the customers all over the world.
